en: Lower your leg down toward the floor.
Place your palms directly beneath your shoulder joints.

ru: Поднимите одно колено, и другим коснитесь лба.
en: Lift one knee and touch your forehead with the other.

Elevate one knee and touch your forehead with the opposite.
Lift a knee and reach your forehead with the other.
Bring one knee up and touch your forehead with the other.
Raise a knee and place the other against your forehead.

ru: Удерживая колено прижатым ко лбу, сделайте отжимания.
en: Maintain your knee pressed firmly to your forehead while performing push-ups with mindful engagement.
enSynonyms: Keep the knee anchored to your brow as you execute mindful push-ups

Sustain the knee's contact with your forehead while flowing through push-up movements
Engage your core to stabilize the knee against your forehead during push-up practice
Maintain the integrity of the knee-forehead alignment while executing push-up sequences
